project_details.description: Users can purchase and maintain Satellite TV packages and channels. Application has Buy-flow and account management with paymnet history and promotions section. Cart is maintained with Ngrx.
Upper funnel marketing pages for the users to shop available offers and products. Application has more than 200 pages and designed with responsive layout to be used on both mobile and larger devices
E-commerce application for Audi vehicle owners. Designed with Next.js and TypeScript along with Next app router and backend for frontend (bff).

project_details.title: Next.js, React, Context API, TypeScript, bff

project_description: Personal project. Users can book trips using the application

project_details.description: Full stack application using Node.js, MongoDb. Users can view all available trips and successfully book a trip. Payment feature is developed using stripe payments.

project_description: Translate text to multiple available languages.

project_details.description: Langauge translator uses open-source Meta NLLB (Natural Langugage Left Behind) API to translate the input text to the desired language.
